text: Muqtada al-Sadr (; born 12 August 1973) is an Iraqi Shia cleric, politician and militia leader. He is the leader of the Sadrist Movement and the leader of Saraya al-Salam. Muqtada al-Sadr is one of the most influential religious and popular figures in Iraq.Nasr, Vali, The Shia Revival: How Conflicts Within Islam Will Shape the Future (Norton, 2006), p. 192 In May 2018, al-Sadr's coalition emerged as the frontrunnner in Iraq's national elections, the first since the Islamic State was declared defeated in Iraq. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Iraqi politicians Category:Iraqi military people Category:Political activists Category:Communists
title: Muqtada al-Sadr
